name: Integra Global Solutions
tag_list: bookkeeping, payroll, tax-preparation, inbound-call, ticketing, email, live-chat, chat, virtual-assistant, property-management, back, office, web, designing, programming, seo
overview:
Integra Global Solutions Corp is an outsourcing company with a focus on providing value to our clients on a consistent basis. We specialize in executing the following critical business processes

• Bookkeeping, Payroll & Tax preparation • Inbound call support • Ticketing / email support • Live chat support • Virtual Assistants • Technical (level 1 & level 2) support • Property Management Back Office support • Real Estate Virtual Assistants • Administrative support • Search Engine Optimization SEO & SEM • Blog & Content writing • Web Research, Data entry • Web designing, programming & Many more
